Package org.simexid.odoo.controller

Class CrmController

java.lang.Object
org.simexid.odoo.controller.CrmController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${simexid.crm.api-path}") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="simexid.crm.api-enabled", havingValue="true", matchIfMissing=false) public class CrmController extends Object
Controller for Odoo CRM query operations

  • Method Details

    • webhooksSaleorder

      @PostMapping("/webhooks/saleorder") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> webhooksSaleorder(@RequestBody SaleOrderHook input, @RequestParam(value="apikey",required=false) String key, @RequestHeader(value="Authorization",required=false) String authorization)
      Sale order webhooks
      Parameters:
      input - SaleOrderHook object
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error the api is used for intercept odoo webhooks for a sale order

    • webhooksSaleorderline

      Parameters:

      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error the api is used for intercept odoo webhooks for a sale order line

    • getPartner

      @GetMapping("/partner/{field}/{criteria}/{search}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Customer>> getPartner(@PathVariable("field") CrmSearchEnum.SearchField field, @PathVariable("criteria") CrmSearchEnum.SearchOperator criteria, @PathVariable("search") String search, @RequestParam(value="apikey",required=false) String key, @RequestHeader(value="Authorization",required=false) String authorization)
      Get partner
      Parameters:
      field - SearchField enum
      criteria - SearchOperator enum
      search - Search criteria
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of partners/customer for the search criteria, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

      Parameters:
      field - SearchField enum
      criteria - SearchOperator enum
      search - Search criteria
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of sales for the search criteria, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

    • getFields

      @GetMapping("fields/search/{model}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getFields(@PathVariable("model") CrmSearchEnum.Model model, @RequestParam(value="apikey",required=false) String key, @RequestHeader(value="Authorization",required=false) String authorization)
      Get fields
      Parameters:
      model - Model enum
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of fields for the model, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

      Get generic object
      Parameters:
      model - Model enum
      key - API key
      Returns:
